page.title: 04Mad Jack's (continued)
page.content: Two thirds of his trade is made by local people. They get between{1,500 {and 2,000}people per week.Just recently they closed a craft centre and a grocers shop because they had too much work to do.{When they have a {party they go around cutting off the {bottoms of people's ties and pinning {them on a bar.} Their chef lives in a mobile home on the premises. The most popular food is{steak}which costs between{Â£5 and {Â£9. The{canal}no longer helps the trade because{11 miles}further up the canal the banks have{collapsed}so the canal users can't get very far.The Water Board are hoping that it will be open next year. by{Debbie Salt { }and{Kirsty MacKenzie
